has been slow. dr. ragnar lafsson, one of two full-time psychologists assigned to the clinic, was savoring a sandwich alone in his office a few days ago." not many people have come so far, <q> he says. at first glance, there are still plenty of signs of the good life to which this nation of 320,000 had grown accustomed. the parking lot of kringlan shopping center in reykjav?k is filled with sparkling audis, range rovers and mercedes. but inside the mall, bleary, blond-haired icelanders pace the floor like zombies going through the motions of their former existence. </q> how can i rest easy knowing that everything i've saved all my life is gone? it was something huge. our seniors have worked very hard for five years, so to come out with a win in our last one and give ourselves a chance to go to a bowl game is huge. for many of the departing rams, that was the kicker to all of it. to leave the home stadium with a win was nice. special, even. to attach special significance to it- such as remaining in the hunt for a postseason nod- gives it more meaning. in the end, it could buy them one more game in a colorado state uniform in december. anytime it's your last game and you win at home, it's nice, "tight end Kory Sperry said." to me, i'm not the type to get sentimental about the last game here.

madan said the electronics market was lax." earlier products such as iron, toasters and mixers used to sell in huge numbers but this time sales in this category have gone down by around 60 per cent, he said. philips india's marketing head Vivek Sharma said falling shares will affect consumer psychology. also, there is a fear of job losses but actual job losses have not been too significant to materially affect the festive shopping, "he said.
